Description:
PN - 312059847 - You have failed to ensure that the risks of fire and/or explosion is either eliminated or reduced so far as is reasonably practicable in that the LCA machine has two non-ATEX rated electrical panels in close proximity to two heated metal tanks known as "kits" which contain flammable (liquids) which are poured and vapours coming into contact with these electrical panels.
PN - 312059848 - You have failed to ensure that the risks of fire and/or explosion is either eliminated or reduced so far as is reasonably practicable in that the LCB machine has two non-ATEX rated electrical panels in close proximity to two heated metal tanks known as the "kits" which contain flammable liquids which are poured and stirred manually through an opening in the tanks and there is a risk of flammable vapours coming into contact with these electrical panels
